response.name: available seats in flights

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/bookings/ \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "flight_id": 1,
    "seat_id": 5,
    "passenger_name": "John Doe",
    "passenger_email": "john@example.com",
    "passenger_phone": "+1234567890"
  }'
